lg.l: I should take with me a pad of paper and a pencil when I'm not near you
And write down all the things my heart proclaims are feelings to
One thing just flows into another; you never know what to expect
Macintosh computers are just too fucking hi-tech for me
Give me an MT400 and I'll paint a song for you
Your 1's and 0's are incredible but my analog tape is true
"A man hears what he wants to hear and disregards the rest"
Fuck! If I had more alcohol I'd be in my element
